MAIN_MESSAGE: Due to high winds in WA4 postcode area of Warrington, we have sustained damage to our overhead line network over a widespread area. Our engineers are currently assessing the damage and when it is safe to commence repairs will make every effort to restore supplies as quickly and safely as possible by 2.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience.  This message was updated at 9:15AM on 11th March 2021.
